text: @realTuckFrumper @WhiteHouse @PressSec @POTUS @GOP It is wonderful that #BunkerBoy is going to hold KKK Hate rallies again. The more MAGAs that he can kill with the Coronavirus means he will have less MAGAs to vote for him in November. GREAT ELECTION STRATEGY!!!!
